name: Media Meta & Force Regenerate
author: Jordy Meow

sections.description:
Displays the metadata information in the Media Library. Regenerates the metadata and thumbnails even if they exist. This plugin is really useful when the metadata is broken. This is an extremely light plugin.

I am using this tool for debugging many installs and decided to make it available here. Try it, discuss it. Remarks are very welcome ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Check your Media Library in List Mode.
sections.changelog:
0.0.3

  • Info: Make sure it works with latest WordPress.

0.0.2

  • Update: Make sure it regenerates all the custom sizes.

0.0.1

  • Info: Initial commit.
